channel.title: Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare
channel.description: Recent content in Assignments on MIT OpenCourseWare

item.title: Assignments
item.description: The assignments from the class are presented here, by week. WEEKÂ # TOPICS ASSIGNMENTS Part 1: Introduction to Probability 1 Events and their Probability, Elementary Operations with Events, Total Probability Theorem, Independence, Bayes’ Theorem Homework 1 (PDF) 2-3 Random Variables and Vectors, Discrete and Continuous Probability Distributions Homework 2 (PDF) Homework 3 (PDF) 4 Functions of Random Variables and Derived Distributions Homework 4 (PDF) 5-6 Expectation of Random Variables and Functions of Random Variables

item.title: homework_1_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource includes assignments based on the following topics: Events and their Probability, Elementary Operations with Events, Total Probability Theorem, Independence, Bayes’ Theorem.

item.title: homework_10_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 4 problem statements based on the following topics: Point Estimation of Distribution Parameters: Methods of Moments and Maximum Likelihood, Bayesian Analysis.

item.title: homework_2_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource includes the asignment based on the topics: Random Variables and Vectors, Discrete and Continuous Probability Distributions.

item.title: homework_3_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource includes problems based on the following topics: Random Variables and Vectors, Discrete and Continuous Probability Distributions.

item.title: homework_4_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource includes problems based on the following topics: Functions of Random Variables and Derived Distributions.

item.title: homework_5_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource contains the problems based on the following topics: Expectation of Random Variables and Functions of Random Variables, Moments of Variables and Vectors.

item.title: homework_6_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource contains four problems based on the following topics: Expectation of Random Variables and Functions of Random Variables, Moments of Variables and Vectors.

item.title: homework_7_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource contains 2 problems based on: Conditional Second Moment Analysis.

item.title: homework_8_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource includes a problem to obtain the probability density function, cross-sectional area, and mean stress.

item.title: homework_9_2005.pdf
item.description: This resource includes a problem to sketch the failure boundary, and calculate the second moment reliability index.
